item.title: India, a Big Source of Illegal Migration, Hopes to Navigate the Trump Storm
item.description: Fear and uncertainty are rippling through India, which sends more undocumented migrants to the United States than any other country outside Latin Amer...

item.title: Violence Reported as Deadline Passes for Troop Withdrawal in Lebanon
item.description: Israeli forces killed at least two people and injured 31 in the country’s south, Lebanese officials said. Hezbollah and Israel had agreed to withdraw ...

item.title: Australia Day Protesters Vandalize Melbourne and Sydney Statues
item.description: The vandalism unfolded in Sydney, Melbourne and Canberra. Australia Day is a divisive holiday that critics see as a symbol of racism and oppression.

item.title: Mike Hynson, Surfing Star of ‘The Endless Summer,’ Dies at 82
item.description: The hit 1966 surfing documentary immortalized the maverick California wave rider as an archetype of the footloose rebel surfer.

item.title: As Hamas Releases More Israeli Hostages, It Puts on a Show of Force
item.description: The handover of four female Israeli soldiers by Hamas on Saturday came as Israel released 200 prisoners. But a dispute arose over the hostage release ...
